name: Chaos Root
description:
This is my submission for the Go Godot Game Jam - June 2021. The theme of the jam was "Growth".

Movement: WASD or arrow keys.

Shoot: Spacebar or left mouse button

Objective: Reach the exit before the Chaos Roots get you.

  • Audio and bullet/explosion graphics from Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/
  • Godot 3.3.1
  • Microsoft Paint
